definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Robespierre was the founder of French democratic politics and of virtue.
sentences.chinese: 羅伯斯比爾是法國民主政治的奠基人和關德的締造者。

sentences.english: They were inspirational figures, dreamers of beautiful dreams.
sentences.chinese: 因爲他們是靈魂的啓蒙者，是美好夢想的締造者。

sentences.english: Harbert, the founder of American North West Airline, made such remarks.
sentences.chinese: 美國西北航空公司的締造者哈伯曾經如是說。

sentences.english: For two years, deal makers have been searching for signs of that bottom.
sentences.chinese: 兩年以來，交易締造者們一直在搜尋市場觸底的跡象。

sentences.english: It is the creator of circumstances and events.
sentences.chinese: 它是環境和活動的締造者。

sentences.english: The greatest honor history can bestow is the title of peacemaker .
sentences.chinese: 歷史所能頒賜的最大榮耀，就是和平締造者這個頭銜。

sentences.english: Willard Marriott, William McKnight, who was the person who really architected the early days of 3M.
sentences.chinese: 威廉邁克奈特是3M公司早期輝煌的締造者。

definition: surveyor's pole/post (used for a landmark)/CL:根[gen1]/(fig.) goal/model/benchmark
to rebel against orthodoxy/to depart from established practices
after hard work and numerous revisions (idiom)/the vicissitudes of life
to have a unique style of one's own (idiom)
see 承前啟後|承前启后[cheng2 qian2 qi3 hou4]
